long.en:
â­ The Bubble New Tab is a minimalist and aesthetically pleasing new tab extension that seamlessly interacts with multi-function boxes.
ğŸ”‘ Supports customizing multiple search engines, and quick search through keys.
ğŸ“Œ Add omnibox keywords to achieve the same search experience as the start page.
ğŸˆ Elegant dark mode, and page animations.
ğŸ§© Optional weather card, one-word card.

ğŸ§± By using the format ':key', you can use the search engine specified in the settings for searching. The extension has already come with some commonly used search engines, such as Google, Github, etc.
ğŸ–‡ï¸ For example, if you enter ':gg ' in the search box, you can use Google to search, ':git ' to use Github to search.
